reviewText:
The Girls of Scores is 55 minutes long and was released in 1998. The video starts with two Score Girls coming out of a taxicab and stripping down till their panties. We are introduced to seven Score Girls:

1. Robin is from Dallas, she is Chinese on her father side and French\Irish on her mother side. She does a pole dance and strips.

2. Shannon from upstate New York-discovered by Playboy and love sports. She undresses with some candles around.

3. Carla from Seattle, Washington-likes being in a quiet atmosphere when not working

4. Savanah-worked for Howard Stern, wears a dress and strips on a fire escape

5. Tamara from Fort Lauderdale likes horses, going to the beach, and ride show horses

6. Amy Lynn from Plymouth, Massachusetts-got involved with Penthouse and Playboy, worked with Howard Stern, showers topless

7. Nadia from Romania is very picky, likes to be bossy; she strips while wearing a good school girl uniform

Between Score Girls we get a little snippet of girls in the nude or in sexy bikinis. The scenes in this video are steamy. I give The Girls of Scores an AAA+++.
I want to say that it was very well shot and looks great. It was very insightful.

My video is identical to the image shown, and NOWHERE does it have the Playboy logo on it. It is a Universal Music and Video distribution/Shadowmax Entertainment.

But it is rather tame even compared to a Playboy type video, and except for one part, could be rated PG
